p: Of S. cyclophylla 95% aqueous-ethanolic extract, 10 mg was dissolved in 500 µL of DMSO and raised to 1 mL with media to prepare the stock solution. Of this stock solution, 40 µL was diluted to 1 mL with media to prepare the first concentration of 400 μg/mL with 2× diluted to a final concentration of 6.25 μg/mL.
